p: A food system resiliency assessment for the city of Baltimore also identified food system vulnerabilities to climate change-related hazards, and the results of the report will inform the development of a Food System Resilience Plan for the city [ 43]. There has yet to be a comprehensive examination of climate change impacts on Canadaâ€™s food system at the national or local levels. The proposed framework is scalable and could guide such studies, ensuring unique characteristics of Canada are considered and key vulnerabilities are not overlooked.
